subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Professional sports are flourishing in New Orleans, and they are often cited as examples of civic pride and recovery from Hurricane Katrina. But college teams are struggling on the field or at the box office, and in many cases both.
snippet: Professional sports are flourishing in New Orleans, and they are often cited as examples of civic pride and recovery from Hurricane Katrina. But college teams are struggling on the field or at the box office, and in many cases both.
